name: aright
description: Small and fast JS Object and Type validation.

directories.bump:patch: npm run build:prod && git add -A && git commit -m 'patch bump' && git push && mversion patch -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
directories.bump:minor: npm run build:prod && git add -A && git commit -m 'minor bump' && git push && mversion minor -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
directories.bump:major: npm run build:prod && git add -A && git commit -m 'major bump' && git push && mversion major -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push

author: Gilles Coomans <gilles.coomans@gmail.com>
